short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ViewerSense extension makes viewing your Google Analytics data easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ViewerSense extension makes viewing your Google Analytics data easy. The current version includes Active User counts for the previous 30 calendar days for the page path in the browser URL.

Simple two-step process:
1. Add our service account as a user with Viewer permissions
2. Add the desired property ID from Google Analytics to the extension

For questions or feedback, please contact members@lernevate.com.
